definition: variant of 麼|么[me5]
exclamatory final particle
interrogative final particle
suffix, used to form interrogative 什麼|什么[shen2 me5], what?, indefinite 這麼|这么[zhe4 me5] thus, etc
radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 4)/see 撇[pie3]
old variant of 私[si1]
old variant of 某[mou3]
what?/something/anything
like that/in that way/or so/so/so very much/about/in that case
how?/what?/why?
variant of 怎麼|怎么[zen3 me5]
how?/what?/why?
variant of 怎麼|怎么[zen3 me5]
so much/this much/how much?/this way/like this
why?/for what reason?
what kind?/what sort?/what appearance?
how?/how about?/how was it?/how are things?
nothing/it doesn't matter/it's nothing/never mind
what's to be done
or/either one or the other
how (wonderful etc)/what (a great idea etc)/however (difficult it may be etc)/(in interrogative sentences) how (much etc)/to what extent

sentences.english: Inspired by a cross between a fusebox and a prison.
sentences.chinese: 那灵感是来自保险丝盒与监狱的杂交么。

sentences.english: Not very much. You are a turnkey at the Conciergerie?
sentences.chinese: 要你干的并不太多。你在附属监狱管牢房么？
伦敦的台尔森银行么，先生？

sentences.english: How could you have handled it differently?
sentences.chinese: 你能以不同的方式完成它么？

sentences.english: What did they do? Please give at least two examples.
sentences.chinese: 他们做了什么？请至少举出兩个例子。
她还跟那个异教徒一起么？

sentences.english: Do we require of our writers to fight the system?
sentences.chinese: 我们要求我们的作家去和体制抗争么？

sentences.english: I'd do it agian. you know?
sentences.chinese: 我愿意再来一次，你知道么？

sentences.english: Could you tell me what the maximun weight allowances?
sentences.chinese: 你能告诉我最高津贴是多少么？

sentences.english: Can you get a ticket for me?
Do you understand what I said?
B: Well, that sounds like it would be OK. Just be careful.
sentences.chinese: 是么，那听起来好像还可以答应，只是要小心一点。

sentences.english: Gerry Conlon: You're not dying alright?
Then am I to go back empty-handed?

sentences.chinese: 那么，我就要开始老了么？

definition: (question particle for "yes-no" questions)
see 嗎啡|吗啡, morphine
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
modal particle indicating that sth is obvious/particle indicating a pause for emphasis
dialectal equivalent of 為什麼|为什么[wei4 shen2 me5]
yes, that's right/variant of 似的[shi4 de5]
(coll.) As a matter of fact, ... (used to introduce evidence for what one has just asserted)
why?/for what reason?
gnaw
dialectal equivalent of 怎麼|怎么[zen3 me5]
loud noise/shout/suddenly
Correct!/Oh, that's right, ... (when one suddenly remembers sth one wanted to mention)/Oh, by the way, ...
interjection or grunt of agreement/uhm/Ah, OK/expression of recognition/Oh, it's you!
modal particle ending sentence, showing affirmation, approval, or consent
interjection of surprise/Ah!/Oh!
interjection expressing doubt or requiring answer/Eh?/what?
interjection of surprise or doubt/Eh?/My!/what's up?
woolen material

particle indicating that a previously asked question is to be applied to the preceding word ("What about ...?", "And ...?")/particle for inquiring about location ("Where is ...?")/particle signaling a pause, to emphasize the preceding words and allow the listener time to take them on board ("ok?", "are you with me?")/(at the end of a declarative sentence) particle indicating continuation of a state or action/particle indicating strong affirmation
that's right/sure!/rest assured!/that's good/can't go wrong
what are you doing?/whatever for?/why on earth?
is or isn't/yes or no/whether or not
how?/what?/why?
variant of 怎麼|怎么[zen3 me5]
how?/how about?/how was it?/how are things?
